title: I didn't receive a Mastery token?
body:
I just got an S- as Mordekaiser, and I have level 5 mastery with him. However, I didn't get a mastery token on him. Is that because it was an ARAM game? 
If that's the case, that's silly that ARAM doesn't give you mastery tokens.

replies.body: This was most likely because you had already earned a mastery chest with Mordekaiser this season. Once the new season starts you'll be able to start earning those mastery chests again, you can only get one per champion per season.

Not a mastery chest, a Mastery token. As in to get to Level 6 Mastery on the champion, that you need two of to get Level 6 mastery.
But thanks for replying!

No problem. :D
Thanks for the explanation, that actually makes a lot more sense. 
Thanks again for replying!

>However, I didn't get a mastery token on him. Is that because it was an ARAM game?

Yes, it is, as mentioned in the [official support article](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204211284). And yes, it is incredibly silly that tokens are available in Blind Pick SR, but not ARAM or even ranked TT. Maybe if enough people bug Riot about it, they'll finally enable tokens drops outside SR.
Same.  Have a level 5 Janna, I've gotten TWO S- in the last few days, and I don't see any Mastery tokens.
